From: Sara Abdelfadel <Sara.Abdelfadel@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 10:01 PM
To: Lina El Moabbi <Lina.Elmoabbi@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Joseph Ibrahim <Joseph.Ibrahim@chalhoub.com>; Kala Manickam <Kala.Manickam@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Insurance Coverage for Warehouse

 

Dear Lina, 

 

We are currently in the process of finalizing the contract with the supplier for the solar panel installation at the warehouse. A realistic timeline for installation would be toward the end of Q1 or Q2 2025.

 

Regarding the insurance coverage at the warehouse, is it possible to adjust the policy to include coverage for the solar panels?

 

Thank you,

SARA ABDELFADEL​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ PROJECT MANAGEMENT

QATAR LUXURY CO. WLL

DOHA

‑

QATAR

+974 3319 6363

	
 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.chalhoubgroup.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C314195e96e6f47e0d77c08dcfe29d138%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638664702768552249%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=56HsjmdJUjsuRUhzP%2FRMzo6rmi7ZSjpei7e%2FedSNS5o%3D&reserved=0>

ID: C1PGL6K_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Lina El Moabbi <Lina.Elmoabbi@chalhoub.com>; Sara Abdelfadel <Sara.Abdelfadel@chalhoub.com>
CC: Joseph Ibrahim <Joseph.Ibrahim@chalhoub.com>; Kala Manickam <Kala.Manickam@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-06 10:50
Subject: Re: Insurance Coverage for Warehouse
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Lina,

We can include the solar panels after the finalization of the installation.

However, during the installation period, there needs to be cover provided by the contractor installing the solar panels for damages as a result of the works.

After installation, cover for property in the open is covered for fire and lightning as per the standard policy wording.

Trust the above clarifies.

Best Regards,
Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​	
SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
+971 4 8045000
